page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {Crime}in Port Glasgow has increased steadily over the years.Most crimes appear to be commited by 17_40 year old males.Domestic disputes,drunkeness and{vandalism}are the main problems. Much of the vandalism is juvenile crimes which people say are the result of unemployment.Domestic disputes are also said to be the result of lack of money and{unemployment}or alcoholism. Apart from these crimes there is also a lot of thefts and the occasional murders. Criminals have to go to the Court of Law in Greenock. Many people believe that there is not enough police in Port Glasgow to deal with the rising amount of crime and that police returning to the beat will reduce crime and help the fight for{law and order.
